response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that the product is valued at $15,000 by you, making it an invaluable asset. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its full value, providing you with a substantial return on investment. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product to your organization.", "product_price": 12000}
